title: slapshot.ts
description: slapshot.ts is an unofficial TypeScript wrapper for the Slapshot: Rebound public API built using Axios; this library provides developers a way to easily integrate game data into their applications.

title: autoclicker
description: Proof of concept autoclicker developed with the game Minecraft in mind. It includes advanced features such as drops, spikes, variation, etc., in order to produce difficult to detect click patterns.
